description: S3 bucket ops, sizes, trends, etc. and overall Ceph activity.

panels.description: Per minute instead of per second.
panels.title: COPY Operations per S3 Bucket (ops/min)

panels.description: Actual (raw - thats how much data is generated) and Replicated (thats how much storage is needed for it).
panels.title: S3 Storage Usage

panels.description: The number of objects within S3 buckets, multiply by 1000 to get exact value.
panels.title: S3 Objects (Thousands)

panels.description: 11 - default shards. We recomed for 100k objects per 1 shard for best S3 performance.
panels.title: S3 Bucket Shards

targets.expr: (sum(ceph_pg_scrubbing * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.meta*"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_deep * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.meta*"}) by (pg))

(sum(ceph_pg_scrubbing * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.index*"}) by (pg))+(sum(ceph_pg_deep * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.index*"}) by (pg))

((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.non-ec*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.control*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.log*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.root*"}) by (pg)))

(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.data*"}) by (pg))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.index*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.buckets.non-ec*"}) by (pg)))

(sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.meta*"}))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.control*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.log*"}) by (pg)))+((sum(ceph_pg_backfilling * on(pool_id) group_left(name) ceph_pool_metadata{name=~".*rgw.root*"}) by (pg)))

panels.description: A counter to see which disks have been used the most
panels.title: Total Ops History per OSD

title: Ceph - S3 Bucket Metrics
